item.description:
Hey All,

Announcing our 1st Outdoor Party at Wompatuck State Park:

Since we are such a large group and partying at somebody’s house may not be feasible, let’s camp out and have fun!

We have a big campground/multiple sites reserved at Wompatuck State Park in Hingham. Big thanks to Luke for setting it up!

Things to bring (more details TBD):

Food: We can cook at the camp, so bring some for yourself and a little to share.
Drinks
Firewood
Stoves
Water
Games to play around the campfire

Personal camping gear: tent, sleeping bag, sleeping pad, flash light, warm clothing. We should look into sharing tents too.

Fees: Please bring $5 (preferably cash) to cover the camping fees.

Temperatures: High’s in the 60’s and lows in the 40’s, so plan accordingly.

I am also going to post this on the Social Fun meetup, so please RSVP only on one of the 2 sites.

Look for updates to this event.

http://www.mass.gov/d...
http://www.friendsofw...
http://maps.google.co...


Activities (description swiped from one of the websites):

The park offers a myriad of activities for all outdoor interests including 262 wooded campsites, twelve miles of paved bicycle paths and miles of single track suitable for novice as well as aggressive mountain bikers, wooded bridle paths, and hiking trails. Also, fishing is allowed in the Cohasset Reservoir.
item.name: Outdoor Party (camping) at Wompatuck State Park
